content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=1-3, y=1)
Consists of:
- 2 Stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) storing iron plates

### Additional Storage Area (Position x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=2-4, y=7-9)
Consists of:
- 2 Stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at position (7,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5)
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipe system connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam pipe system (currently empty) between boiler and steam engine

### Electrical Distribution Network
Consists of multiple small electric poles forming a network (ID=1792) connecting various parts of the factory

### Research Facility
Consists of:
- Lab (connected to electrical network ID=1792)

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Requirements
- Research required technologies before attempting to craft items that depend on them
- Assembling Machine 1 requires Automation technology to be researched before it can be crafted

### Entity Placement Issues
- Ensure you have the required item in inventory before attempting to place it
- Verify that the target position is valid and unoccupied before placing entities

### Power System Issues
- Boiler is not functioning due to lack of fuel
- Steam engine is not receiving steam due to disconnected/empty pipe system
- Ensure proper fuel supply and fluid connections in power generation systems
